script_text:
Lily,today is the last day of school.Where are you going in
your winter vacation?
I'm going to Harbin with my parents.I don't like cold weather.
I'm afraid of getting a cold.
Oh,you'll be fine.What are you going to do there?
We're going to see ice lanterns and play in the snow.My
uncle's family live there.We're going to visit them.
Are you going to ski?
Yes.I can't ski now,but I'm going to have skiing lessons.
OK,have a nice winter vacation!
You too!I'm going to bring back some sausages for you!I hear
they are famous in Harbin.
Thank you.

engine_raw.gemini_feedback: 学生整体语感尚可，但存在明显的“词尾脱落”习惯，尤其是复数 -s 和所有格 -'s 经常被忽略。此外，在处理 be going to 结构时，对动词原形的掌握不够稳固，出现了将 have 误读为 having 的情况。建议加强对单词末尾辅音的控制力，并注意语法结构对发音的影响。
engine_raw.detected_transcript: Lily, today is last day of school. Where are you going in your summer or winter vacation? I'm going to Harbin with my parent. I don't like cold weather. I afraid of go getting a cold. Oh, you'll be fine. What are you going what are you going to do there? I'm going to see Iceland turns and play in the snow. My uncle family live there. We are going to visit them. Are you going to ski? Yes. I can't ski now, but I'm going to having skiing lesson. OK, have a nice winter vacation! You too! I'm going to bring back some sausage for you! I hear they are famous in Harbin. Thank you.

conflict_details.comment: 注意 'the last day' 中的定冠词不能省略。

conflict_details.got: 先读成了 summer 后自我纠正
conflict_details.comment: 虽然纠正了，但影响了流利度，建议视读时先扫视全文。
听起来像单数 parent，注意复数后缀。

conflict_details.got: 漏读了 /m/ 音，只发出了 /aɪ/
conflict_details.comment: I'm afraid 中的 'm 不能丢，否则句子缺少谓语。

conflict_details.got: 在单词前多读了一个 go
conflict_details.comment: 出现了口吃/添加词现象。
ice 的结尾 /s/ 与 lanterns 的开头衔接不自然，导致听感偏差。
听起来是 My uncle family，应为 uncle's。
语法错误导致的发音偏差。
这个单词的复数发音较难，应为 /ˈsɒsɪdʒɪz/。

integrated_feedback.overall_comment: 同学你好！你的声音很清晰，朗读时很有感情，能够听出你在努力模仿对话的节奏。不过，你有一个小小的‘吞音’习惯，就像吃零食掉渣一样，很多单词的结尾（比如复数 s）被你悄悄吞掉了。如果能把这些细节补齐，你的英语会听起来更专业！
specific_suggestions: 把 I'm 中的 /m/ 发完整，嘴唇要闭合。
练习 sausages 的发音，注意最后要多发一个 /ɪz/ 的音。
在读 uncle's family 时，在 uncle 后面加一个轻微的嘶嘶声 /z/。
practice_tips: 专门找一段复数名词很多的句子，夸张地朗读末尾的 s 音。
录音后自己听一遍，数一数漏掉了几个 's'。
integrated_feedback.fun_challenge: 试着快速读三次 'Six slippery snails slid slowly'，看能不能把每个 s 都读清楚！

top_errors.description: 普遍缺失单词末尾的复数或所有格后缀
top_errors.improvement: 练习在单词结尾清晰地发出 /s/ 或 /z/ 音，不要为了赶语速而省略词尾。
注意 I'm 是 I am 的缩写，必须发出闭口音 /m/，不能只读 I。

top_errors.description: 动词形式错误，将 have 读成 having
top_errors.improvement: 注意 be going to 后面接动词原形，不要习惯性加 ing。

mistakes.got: 先读成了 summer 后自我纠正
mistakes.desc: Said '先读成了 summer 后自我纠正' instead of 'winter'
Said '漏掉了末尾的 /s/' instead of 'parents'

mistakes.got: 漏读了 /m/ 音，只发出了 /aɪ/
mistakes.desc: Said '漏读了 /m/ 音，只发出了 /aɪ/' instead of 'I'm'

mistakes.got: 在单词前多读了一个 go
mistakes.desc: Said '在单词前多读了一个 go' instead of 'getting'
Said '听起来像 Iceland turns' instead of 'ice lanterns'

hesitations.desc: 检测到了一些填充词。尝试用停顿代替它们。
tips: 在想说什么的时候，试着深呼吸而不是发出'嗯'的声音。
尝试放慢语速，给自己更多思考时间。

completeness.title: 完整度分析
completeness.insight: 内容覆盖率: 99% (漏读 0 个关键词)
tips: 整体完整度很高，只漏读了一些功能词，继续保持！
